issue.title: [Rust] [Arrow] catch up with flatbuffers 0.8.1
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11222](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11222). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The major change in <https://docs.rs/flatbuffers/0.8.1/flatbuffers/index.html> is PR [https://github.com/google/flatbuffers/pull/6393,](https://github.com/google/flatbuffers/pull/6393),) which fixed some possible memory alignment issues.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11222?focusedCommentId=17268225) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
Issue resolved by pull request 9176
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/9176>
